titles.title: Recognizing the need for diapers and expressing support for donating generously to diaper banks, diaper drives, and organizations that distribute diapers to families in need.
Recognizing the need for diapers and expressing support for donating generously to diaper banks, diaper drives, and organizations that distribute diapers to families in need.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for organizations that distribute diapers to families in need and encourages donations to such organizations.
